statements: SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, created_at FROM alerts WHERE alert_type LIKE 'Critical%';
SELECT alert_id, created_at FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Warning' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, created_at FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_id ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT alert_id, customer_id, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_description LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY customer_id, created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_alerts > 3;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(created_at) AS latest_alert_time FROM alerts GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_alert_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, alert_type, alert_time FROM customers JOIN alerts ON customers.customer_id = alerts.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, balance FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, balance FROM customers WHERE balance < 5000 AND customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, balance, alert_type, alert_message, alert_time FROM customers c JOIN alerts a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE alert_time >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, SUM(a.balance) AS total_alert_balance FROM customers c JOIN alerts a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name, c.email HAVING total_alert_balance > 5000 ORDER BY total_alert_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, alert_time FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_time DESC;
SELECT account_balance, customer_name FROM customer_details WHERE account_balance > 5000;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_details;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_details WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT MAX(account_balance) AS max_balance FROM customer_details;
SELECT customer_name, alert_type, alert_time FROM customer_details INNER JOIN alerts ON customer_details.customer_id = alerts.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, activity_type, activity_time FROM customer_details INNER JOIN suspicious_activities ON customer_details.customer_id = suspicious_activities.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'debit' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alert WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM customer INNER JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alert WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, activity_description FROM customer INNER JOIN suspicious_activity ON customer.customer_id = suspicious_activity.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_balance, account_type FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 2 AND alert_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, log_type, log_message FROM customers c, security_logs s WHERE c.customer_id = s.customer_id AND log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
